–æ—Ä—ñ—î–Ω—Ç–∞—Ü—ñ—è –Ω–∞ —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç —Ç–∞ —Å—Ç—Ä–µ—Å–æ—Å—Ç—ñ–π–∫—ñ—Å—Ç—å; –ø—Ä–∞–≥–Ω–µ–Ω–Ω—è –¥–æ —Å–∞–º–æ–≤–¥–æ—Å–∫–æ–Ω–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—è —Ç–∞ –±–∞–∂–∞–Ω–Ω—è –≤—á–∏—Ç–∏—Å—è; –¥–æ—Å–≤—ñ–¥ —Ä–æ–±–æ—Ç–∏ —É —Å—Ñ–µ—Ä—ñ –ø—ñ–¥—Ç—Ä–∏–º–∫–∏ –∫–ª—ñ—î–Ω—Ç—ñ–≤ –±—É–¥–µ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–≤–∞–≥–æ—é; –≤–º—ñ–Ω–Ω—è –∞–Ω–∞–ª—ñ—Ç–∏—á–Ω–æ –º–∏—Å–ª–∏—Ç–∏, –ø—Ä–∞—Ü—é–≤–∞—Ç–∏ —É —Ä–µ–∂–∏–º—ñ –±–∞–≥–∞—Ç–æ–∑–∞–¥–∞—á–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—ñ —Ç–∞ –∑ —Ä–æ–∑—É–º—ñ–Ω–Ω—è–º —Å—Ç–∞–≤–∏—Ç–∏—Å—è –¥–æ –ø–æ—Ç—Ä–µ–± —Ç–∞ –ø—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º –∫–ª—ñ—î–Ω—Ç—ñ–≤; –î–æ—î–¥–Ω—É–π—Ç–µ—Å—è –¥–æ –Ω–∞—à–æ—ó –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∏, —è–∫—â–æ –≤–∏ –±–∞–∂–∞—î—Ç–µ: –∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ –ø—Ä–∞—Ü—é–≤–∞—Ç–∏ –∑–∞–¥–ª—è —è–∫—ñ—Å–Ω–∏—Ö –∑–º—ñ–Ω –º–∞–π–±—É—Ç–Ω—å–æ–≥–æ —Å—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–æ–ª–æ–≥—ñ—ó; —Å—Ç–∞—Ç–∏ —á–∞—Å—Ç–∏–Ω–æ—é –¥—Ä—É–∂–Ω—å–æ—ó –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∏ –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—ñ–æ–Ω–∞–ª—ñ–≤; –ø–æ—Å—Ç—ñ–π–Ω–æ –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—ñ–π–Ω–æ –∑—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–∞—Ç–∏ —Ç–∞ —Ä–æ–∑–≤–∏–≤–∞—Ç–∏—Å—è; –ø—ñ–¥—Ç—Ä–∏–º—É–≤–∞—Ç–∏ –±–∞–ª–∞–Ω—Å –º—ñ–∂ —Ä–æ–±–æ—Ç–æ—é —Ç–∞ –æ—Å–æ–±–∏—Å—Ç–∏–º –∂–∏—Ç—Ç—è–º; –º–∞—Ç–∏ –≥–Ω—É—á–∫–∏–π –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ—ñ–∫ –∑ –º–æ–∂–ª–∏–≤—ñ—Å—Ç—é –ø—Ä–∞—Ü—é–≤–∞—Ç–∏ –¥–∏—Å—Ç–∞–Ω—Ü—ñ–π–Ω–æ; –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ñ –ø—ñ–ª—å–≥–∏: 24 —Ä–æ–±–æ—á–∏—Ö –¥–Ω—ñ —â–æ—Ä—ñ—á–Ω–æ—ó –≤—ñ–¥–ø—É—Å—Ç–∫–∏, –º–µ–¥–∏—á–Ω–µ —Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ö—É–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—è, –∫–æ–º–ø–µ–Ω—Å–∞—Ü—ñ—è –≤–∏—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç –∑–∞ –æ–±—ñ–¥–∏, –æ–ø–ª–∞—á—É–≤–∞–Ω—ñ –ª—ñ–∫–∞—Ä–Ω—è–Ω—ñ, —É —Ç.—á. –ø–æ –¥–æ–≥–ª—è–¥—É –∑–∞ —Ö–≤–æ—Ä–æ—é –¥–∏—Ç–∏–Ω–æ—é, –≤—ñ–¥–ø—É—Å—Ç–∫–∏ –¥–ª—è –¥–æ–≥–ª—è–¥—É –∑–∞ –¥–∏—Ç–∏–Ω–æ—é —Ç–æ—â–æ; –∫–æ–º—Ñ–æ—Ä—Ç–Ω–∏–π –æ—Ñ—ñ—Å (–Ω–µ open space!) –Ω–µ–ø–æ–¥–∞–ª—ñ–∫ –ù–∞—Ü—ñ–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω—ñ—á–Ω–æ–≥–æ —É–Ω—ñ–≤–µ—Ä—Å–∏—Ç–µ—Ç—É –£–∫—Ä–∞—ó–Ω–∏ ¬´–ö–ü–Ü¬ª; –º—ñ—Å—Ü—è –ø–∞—Ä–∫—É–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—è –¥–ª—è —Å–ø—ñ–≤—Ä–æ–±—ñ—Ç–Ω–∏–∫—ñ–≤ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω—ñ—ó –ø–µ—Ä—ñ–æ–¥–∏—á–Ω—ñ –≤—ñ–¥—Ä—è–¥–∂–µ–Ω–Ω—è –¥–æ –∫—Ä–∞—ó–Ω –Ñ–≤—Ä–æ–ø–∏; –º–æ–∂–ª–∏–≤—ñ—Å—Ç—å —Å—Ç–∞—Ç–∏ —á–∞—Å—Ç–∏–Ω–æ—é —É—Å–ø—ñ—Ö—É, —è–∫–∏–π –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω—ñ—è 3Shape —Å—Ç–≤–æ—Ä—é–≤–∞–ª–∞ –≤–ø—Ä–æ–¥–æ–≤–∂ 22 —Ä–æ–∫—ñ–≤. –ë–∞–∂–∞—î—Ç–µ –ø—Ä–∏—î–¥–Ω–∞—Ç–∏—Å—è –¥–æ –Ω–∞—à–æ—ó –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∏ —Ç–∞ –∑–º—ñ–Ω—é–≤–∞—Ç–∏ –º–∞–π–±—É—Ç–Ω—î —Å—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–æ–ª–æ–≥—ñ—ó —Ä–∞–∑–æ–º –∑ –Ω–∞–º–∏? 3Shape develops 3D scanners and software solutions that enable dental and hearing professionals to treat more people, more effectively. Our products are market leading innovative solutions that make a real difference in the lives of both patients and dental professionals around the world.3Shape is headquartered in Copenhagen, with development teams in Denmark, Ukraine, North Macedonia and with a production site in Poland.We are a global company with presence in Europe, Asia and the Americas. Founded in a year 2000, today, we serve customers in over 100 countries. Our growing talent pool of over 2000 employees spans 35+ nationalities .3Shape as an employer is committed to Ukraine . Our UA office has a 16 year-old history, and we are continuing to grow, hire and take care of our employees even during the war in Ukraine. Among other actions, we offer a paid military leave to those called to the military service as well as care about our employees' mental health by implementing different supportive activities.If you are looking for stability and confidence in your future, we are the right place for you. You have technical interest and willing to join dynamic and innovative IT company? We are looking for a customer Support Consultant (Spanish and English) to join our energetic and multicultural team who will share our passion for solving problems and building strong relationships with our reselling partners and end-users around the world.Areas of responsibilities: Provide excellent and efficient technical support on 3Shape hardware (3D scanners) and software via online sessions, telephone, e-mails and occasional on-site events. Managing support cases: collect all relevant information from customers, according to company‚Äôs procedures and record this using company‚Äôs CRM Interact with other departments and escalate customers feedback further You should possess the following competencies: Customer oriented approach Good communicator with ability to ask and listen Strong verbal and writing skills in Spanish, English and Ukrainian Problem solving and logical thinking skills Result oriented and stress resistant Aspiration to self-development and eager to learn Analytical, multitasking and empathetic skills Being the part of us means: Meaningful work that helps to change the future of dentistry Work in a unique professional, friendly and supportive environment Constant professional growth and development A healthy work-life balance Possibility of flexible remote work Comprehensive benefits incl. 24 working days of annual vacation; medical insurance; compensation of lunches; paid sick leaves and child sick leaves; maternity and paternity leaves etc Good working conditions in a comfortable office (not open space!) near National Technical University ¬´KPI¬ª A parking lot with free spaces for employees Occasional business trips to Western Europe Opportunity to become a part of the success that 3Shape has created over the past 22 years.

title: Logistics Support Representative
desc: Sargent Logistics, Inc. is an American transportation and logistics company with a head office based in Chicago, IL. Our company provides transportation services throughout the US, with target markets in Washington, Oregon, California (South and North), the Midwest and East Coast.We are looking for a Logistics Support Representative to join our team in the Kyiv office.At this position you will be responsible for: supporting operational activity of the company: documents checking, updating the system, providing updates; monitoring/supervision of fleet and drivers; communication with drivers, staff members and assisting them with various inquiries. Our requirement are: fluent verbal and written English skills; proficient computer skills (typing abilities, Windows and Microsoft Office); organized and responsible; attentive to details; previous experience at similar positions or logistics field would be a plus. What we offer: competitive salary paid in USD; paid fulltime training and internship; work in an international company with an opportunity to develop; career growth; professional and supportive working atmosphere. Work conditions: Office work at the Kyiv city center. Remote isn‚Äôt considered; Shifts Schedule (16‚àí18 shifts monthly): 5 working days/ 3 days off Morning shift (7 AM ‚Äî 2 PM); Afternoon shift (2 PM ‚Äî 10 PM); Night shift (10 PM ‚Äî 7 AM). (Please note, that the schedule includes all shifts). Hybrid work (remote night shifts). If you are looking for a place to start your career in logistics and get opportunities to grow, we are waiting for you!

title: English teacher, –≤—á–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å –ø–æ—á–∞—Ç–∫–æ–≤–∏—Ö –∫–ª–∞—Å—ñ–≤ (–∞–Ω–≥–ª—ñ–π—Å—å–∫–∞ –º–æ–≤–∞)
desc: Maple Bear Kyiv is looking for enthusiastic, hardworking and innovate teachers to join the team. If you are looking for a new experience please do not hesitate to apply for this position. Maple Bear Kyiv –∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—à—É—î –≤ —Å–≤–æ—é –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—É –≤—á–∏—Ç–µ–ª—ñ–≤ –∑—ñ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–Ω—è–º –∞–Ω–≥–ª—ñ–π—Å—å–∫–æ—ó –º–æ–≤–∏.–ë–∞–∂–∞—î–º–æ –±–∞—á–∏—Ç–∏ —É —Å–≤–æ—ó–π –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ñ –ø–µ–¥–∞–≥–æ–≥–∞, —è–∫–∏–π –ª—é–±–∏—Ç—å –¥—ñ—Ç–µ–π —Ç–∞ –≤ –∑–∞—Ö–æ–ø–ª–µ–Ω—ñ –≤—ñ–¥ —Å–≤–æ—î—ó —Ä–æ–±–æ—Ç–∏, –∞ —Ç–∞–∫–æ–∂: –º–∞—î –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ—ñ–ª—å–Ω—É –æ—Å–≤—ñ—Ç—É; –≤—ñ–ª—å–Ω–æ –≤–æ–ª–æ–¥—ñ—î —É–∫—Ä–∞—ó–Ω—Å—å–∫–æ—é –º–æ–≤–æ—é —Ç–∞ –º–∞—î –≤–∏—Å–æ–∫–∏–π —Ä—ñ–≤–µ–Ω—å –∞–Ω–≥–ª—ñ–π—Å—å–∫–æ—ó –º–æ–≤–∏ Upper-Intermediate —Ç–∞ –≤–∏—â–µ; –∑–Ω–∞—î —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏—Ñ—ñ–∫—É –≤–∏—Ö–æ–≤–Ω–æ—ó —Ä–æ–±–æ—Ç–∏ –∑ –¥—ñ—Ç—å–º–∏ –≤—ñ–¥–ø–æ–≤—ñ–¥–Ω–æ–≥–æ –≤—ñ–∫—É, —Ä–æ–∑—É–º—ñ—î—Ç—å—Å—è –Ω–∞ –æ—Å–æ–±–ª–∏–≤–æ—Å—Ç—è—Ö –¥–∏—Ç—è—á–æ—ó –≤—ñ–∫–æ–≤–æ—ó –ø—Å–∏—Ö–æ–ª–æ–≥—ñ—ó; —É–º—ñ—î –∑–∞–∫–æ—Ö–∞—Ç–∏ –º–∞–ª–µ—á—É –≤ –Ω–∞–≤—á–∞–Ω–Ω—è; –º–∞—î –∫—Ä–µ–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ñ —ñ–¥–µ—ó —Ç–∞ –±–∞–∂–∞–Ω–Ω—è —É—Ç—ñ–ª—é–≤–∞—Ç–∏ —ó—Ö —É –∂–∏—Ç—Ç—è; —Ü—ñ–∫–∞–≤–∏—Ç—å—Å—è –Ω–æ–≤–∏–º–∏ –æ—Å–≤—ñ—Ç–Ω—ñ–º–∏ –ø–æ–≥–ª—è–¥–∞–º–∏, –ø—ñ–¥—Ö–æ–¥–∞–º–∏ —Ç–∞ –∫–æ–Ω—Ü–µ–ø—Ü—ñ—è–º–∏. –ú–∏ –ø—Ä–æ–ø–æ–Ω—É—î–º–æ: –æ—Ñ—ñ—Ü—ñ–π–Ω–µ –ø—Ä–∞—Ü–µ–≤–ª–∞—à—Ç—É–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—è; –≤—ñ–¥–ø—É—Å—Ç–∫–∞, –ª—ñ–∫–∞—Ä–Ω—è–Ω–∏–π –∑–≥—ñ–¥–Ω–æ –∑ –ö–ó–ø–ü; –≥—ñ–¥–Ω–∏–π —Ä—ñ–≤–µ–Ω—å —Ñ—ñ–Ω–∞–Ω—Å–æ–≤–æ—ó –≤–∏–Ω–∞–≥–æ—Ä–æ–¥–∏; —Å—É—á–∞—Å–Ω—ñ –Ω–∞–≤—á–∞–ª—å–Ω—ñ –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–∏; —Å–ø—ñ–≤–ø—Ä–∞—Ü—è –≤ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ñ –µ–Ω–µ—Ä–≥—ñ–π–Ω–∏—Ö —Ç–∞ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–µ—Å–∏–≤–Ω–∏—Ö –æ—Å–≤—ñ—Ç—è–Ω –º–æ–∂–ª–∏–≤—ñ—Å—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—ñ–π–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ä–æ—Å—Ç—É —Ç–∞ —Ä–æ–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∫—É; –Ω–∞–≤—á–∞–Ω–Ω—è –≤—ñ–¥ –ö–∞–Ω–∞–¥—Å—å–∫–∏—Ö —Å–ø–µ—Ü—ñ–∞–ª—ñ—Å—Ç—ñ–≤ –º–æ–∂–ª–∏–≤—ñ—Å—Ç—å –¥–ª—è –æ–±–º—ñ–Ω—É –¥–æ—Å–≤—ñ–¥–æ–º –∑ —Ä—ñ–∑–Ω–∏–º–∏ –≤—á–∏—Ç–µ–ª—è–º–∏ –º–µ—Ä–µ–∂—ñ Maple Bear –Ø–∫—â–æ –≤–∞–º –≤—ñ–¥–≥—É–∫–Ω—É–ª–∞—Å—å –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å—ñ—è ‚Äî —á–µ–∫–∞—î–º–æ –Ω–∞ –≤–∞—à–µ —Ä–µ–∑—é–º–µ —Ç–∞ –¥–æ —Å–∫–æ—Ä–æ—ó –∑—É—Å—Ç—Ä—ñ—á—ñ!

title: 3D Visualizer
desc: ArchiCGI Studio is looking for Senior/Middle 3D Artists to work on international architectural projects. Location: Kyiv, office-based.We need a talented 3D artist to create high-quality visualizations for exterior and interior design, as well as 3D animations.Who are our clients? Our clients are designers and architects from the USA, Canada, Europe, and the UAE.Who are we looking for? For the Middle/Senior 3D Artist position, we are looking for candidates with: Proficiency in 3ds Max and Photoshop Experience working with V-Ray, Corona Attention to detail Ability to handle stress and tight deadlines A desire to learn and grow Knowledge of ZBrush, Marvelous Designer, and Substance Painter is a plus.What we offer: Our 3D artists receive: Competitive pay (percentage of each project) ‚Äî $700 to $3000 Creative and large-scale projects A passionate CGI team to work with Mentorship support: every team has a mentor to help with professional and creative development Company-funded training Access to our corporate library How to apply: Send us your portfolio, and we will provide a test assignment. Based on the results, a mentor will select the best candidate to join the team.
